original: Hallgren, Per Ivar, kyrkoherde, Runsten, f. 12/9/02 i Visby av hand:-förest. Adolf H. o. Vilhelmina Persson. G. 44 m. Ingeborg Petersson. Barn: Anders f. 45. — Stud:ex. i Kalm. I 25, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 26, teol. kand. ! samt prakt. teol. prov 29, prästv. f. Växjö stift 30. Tjg. s. v. kommin. i Högsby o. S :t Sigfrid, v. pastor i Södra Hestra o. Gränna samt past :-adj. i Båraryd, kommin. i Blädinge 33, tilltr. 35, kyrkoh. i Runsten o. Långlöt sed. 43. I Blädinge bl. a. ordf. i kyr-ko’Stämma o. skolstyr., ;skolkassör samt ombud f. stiftsrådet, kyrkostämmams ordf. i Rumsten o. Långlöt, folkskolestyr. ordf. i Runsten o. skolrådets i Långlöt. Skr.: bidrag i hembygdskalender.
translated: Hallgren, Per Ivar, clergyman, Runsten, born on September 12, 1902 in Visby to parents: Adolf H. and Vilhelmina Persson. Married in 1944 to Ingeborg Petersson. They had a son named Anders, born in 1945. Per Ivar Hallgren completed his secondary education in Kalmar in 1925 and obtained a Bachelor of Theology degree from Lund University in 1926. He also completed the practical theology exam in 1929, and was ordained as a priest in the Växjö diocese in 1930. He was a temporary curate in Högsby and S:t Sigfrid, assistant pastor in Södra Hestra and Gränna, as well as a pastoral adjutant in Båraryd. He served as a curate in Blädinge from 1933 until he assumed the role of a church warden in 1935. In 1943, he became a rector in Runsten and Långlöt. During his time in Blädinge, he was, among other things, the chairman of the church meeting and school board, school treasurer, and representative for the diocesan council. He was also the chairman of the church meeting in Runsten and Långlöt, chairman of the primary school board in Runsten, and chairman of the school council in Långlöt. Per Ivar Hallgren has contributed to local history calendars.
